Authors:
Jackeline Pereira Andrade, Phellippe Arthur Santos Marbach,
Cristina Souza Motta, Jorge Teodoro Souza
Title: Penicillium restingae sp. nov.
Abstract:
Penicillium restingae isolated from a sandbank in Brazil
is described as a new species on the basis of morphological and
molecular analyses.

trees.title: Penicillium restingae sp. nov. BTUB CMD ITS
